com.groupon.mapreduce.mongo.out
Class MongoInsertMapOutputFormat

java.lang.Object
  
      com.groupon.mapreduce.mongo.out.MongoInsertMapOutputFormat

public class MongoInsertMapOutputFormat
extends

This is a Hadoop output format that accepts a generic MapWritable and does an upsert to a Mongo collection with it. Most of the complexity is in MongoInsertOutputFormat.

Parameters:

port - Mongo port.
db - Mongo database name.
coll - Mongo collection name.

Helper to configure Hadoop with the given MONGO_UPSERT value.

Parameters:
conf - Configuration object in which to set Mongo config.
doUpsert - True if upsert is allowed.
